mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT count(*) FROM PAYMENT JOIN FUNDING USING(FUNDING_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO=${memberNo}

SELECT DISTINCT FUNDING_NO ,PAYMENT_NO ,FUNDING_TITLE ,CATEGORY_NM ,ORDER_ST ,TO_CHAR(PAY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')AS PAY_DT FROM PAYMENT JOIN FUNDING USING(FUNDING_NO) JOIN CATEGORY USING(FUNDING_CATEGORY) JOIN ORDER_ST USING(ORDER_ST_CD) WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo}
SELECT FUNDING_NO FROM FUNDING WHERE FUNDING_ST='Y'

SELECT FUNDING_NO ,CATEGORY_NM ,FUNDING_TITLE ,TO_CHAR(PAY_DT,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS PAY_DT ,PAY_METHOD ,( SELECT SUM((REWARD_PRICE*AMOUNT))AS FULL_PRICE FROM REWARD_ORDER JOIN REWARD USING(REWARD_NO) JOIN PAYMENT USING(PAYMENT_NO) WHERE PAYMENT_NO=#{paymentNo} ) AS FULL_PRICE ,ORDER_ST ,RECIPIENT ,ORDER_PHONE1 ,ORDER_PHONE2 ,ORDER_ADD ,PAYMENT_NO FROM PAYMENT JOIN FUNDING USING(FUNDING_NO) JOIN ORDER_ST USING(ORDER_ST_CD) JOIN CATEGORY USING(FUNDING_CATEGORY) WHERE PAYMENT_NO=#{paymentNo}
SELECT REWARD_TITLE, AMOUNT,(REWARD_PRICE*AMOUNT)AS FULL_PRICE, REWARD_PRICE FROM REWARD_ORDER JOIN REWARD USING(REWARD_NO) JOIN PAYMENT USING(PAYMENT_NO) WHERE PAYMENT_NO=#{paymentNo}

SELECT REWARD_NO, REWARD_TITLE, REWARD_CONTENT, REWARD_PRICE, MAX_REWARD_NO, SUM(AMOUNT) AS REWARD_ORDER_AMOUNT, SUM((REWARD_PRICE*AMOUNT)) AS REWARD_ORDER_PRICE FROM (SELECT * FROM REWARD WHERE FUNDING_NO=#{fundingNo}) JOIN REWARD_ORDER USING(REWARD_NO) GROUP BY REWARD_NO, REWARD_TITLE,REWARD_CONTENT,REWARD_PRICE,MAX_REWARD_NO ORDER BY 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM PAYMENT WHERE MEMBER_NO =5 ORDER BY PAY_DT DESC) WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} AND ROWNUM =1

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, PROFILE_IMG, TRUNC((SYSDATE-PAY_DT)*24*60*60) TIME, NAME_OPEN, PRICE_OPEN, SUM(REWARD_ORDER_PRICE) PAY_FULLPRICE
FROM(
SELECT FUNDING_NO ,PAYMENT_NO ,FUNDING_TITLE ,ORDER_ST_CD ,PAY_DT ,MEMBER_NM ,PROFILE_IMG ,REWARD_PRICE*AMOUNT REWARD_ORDER_PRICE ,PRICE_OPEN ,NAME_OPEN ,MEMBER_NO
FROM PAYMENT P JOIN FUNDING F ON (P.FUNDING_NO = F.FUNDING_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN REWARD_ORDER USING(PAYMENT_NO) JOIN REWARD USING(REWARD_NO) WHERE P.FUNDING_NO= #{fundingNo} AND ORDER_ST_CD IN (1,2,3,4) ) GROUP BY MEMBER_NO,MEMBER_NM, PROFILE_IMG, PAY_DT, NAME_OPEN, PRICE_OPEN
